code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: shows Grade IV esophagitis with Barrett esophagus

observation.value: shows Grade IV esophagitis with Barrett esophagus

td.content: s:a 56 yo white F street sweeper presents with critical chest pain, critical bloody vomiting, critical regurgitation and Stomach for 3 weeks. she has a history of GERD for past 5 years. Patient is a moderate drinker she denies smoking o:Height 64 in, Weight 154 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16, CBC Hgb=10 g/dL,Hct=30 %, Basic Metabolic Panel Na=145 meq/L,K=2.5 meq/L, EGD with biopsy shows Grade IV esophagitis with Barrett esophagus, Patient appears very tired and pale a:GERD p:administered Nexium - 80 mg po bid x 8 weeks, performed CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel, EGD with biopsy, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

Value.Value: CBC , Basic Metabolic Panel , EGD with biopsy ,

content2.Value: CBC , Basic Metabolic Panel , EGD with biopsy ,

td.content: s:patient presents with moderate retrosternal chest pain, moderate heart burn, severe regurgitation and Stomach for 7 days. she has a history of GERD for past 4 years. she is a 58 year old F. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 4 years in her past Patient does not smoke o:Height 64 in, Weight 156 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, Chest = Scattered crackles with occasional wheeze B/L a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lansoprazole - 30 mg po qd x 8 week, and ordered Bravo 48 hour pH.

content2.Unmatched: her past Patient does not smoke
